examples: She was deeply ashamed of her behaviour at the party.
Estaba profundamente avergonzada de su comportamiento en la fiesta.
Mental illness is nothing to be ashamed of.
La enfermedad mental no es nada de lo que avergonzarse.
We must stop being afraid or ashamed of what we are.
Debemos dejar de tener miedo o vergüenza de lo que somos.
His daughter looked such a mess that he was ashamed of her.
Su hija se veía tan desordenada que se avergonzó de ella.
